column1: I've been waiting a long time for this moment.
The dark side of the force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
I was right! The Jedi are taking over!
Once more the Sith shall rule the galaxy! And we shall have peace.
Only through me can you achieve a power greater than any Jedi.
The force is strong with you! A powerful Sith you will become!
I must say you're here sooner than expected.
Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise?
